title: Industrial Manufacturing
subtitle: Industry 4.0 Transformation
description: Achieve zero-downtime operations with predictive maintenance and real-time computer vision at the edge.

challenges.title: Unplanned Downtime
challenges.text: Equipment failure costs manufacturers an estimated $50B annually. Traditional preventative schedules are inefficient and miss critical early warning signs.

challenges.title: Data Silos
challenges.text: Legacy OT protocols (Modbus, Profinet) are incompatible with modern IT cloud analytics, trapping valuable data on the factory floor.

challenges.title: Latency
challenges.text: Cloud-round-trip latency is too high for safety-critical machine control and real-time defect detection on high-speed lines.

solution.heading: The Connected Factory Architecture
solution.text: InfraTech deploys a layered edge architecture. Rugged Gateways normalize OT data locally, running lightweight ML models to detect anomalies in milliseconds.
steps: Ingest data from PLCs and sensors via InfraTech Edge Gateways.
Process telemetry locally using InfraOS containers for immediate insights.
Securely transmit aggregated data to the cloud for long-term trend analysis.

title: Energy & Utilities
subtitle: Smart Grid Modernization
description: Secure, distributed monitoring for renewable assets and substation automation.

challenges.title: Distributed Assets
challenges.text: Solar farms and wind turbines are often located in remote areas with poor connectivity, making centralization difficult.

challenges.title: Cybersecurity Risks
challenges.text: Critical infrastructure is a prime target. Legacy SCADA systems lack modern encryption and identity management.

solution.heading: Grid-Edge Intelligence
solution.text: Our Rugged Servers act as local substations controllers, aggregating data from thousands of smart meters and verifying grid stability autonomously.
steps: Deploy ZeroTrust Mesh to secure communications between substations.
Use local AI to balance load and predict demand spikes.
Enable remote OTA updates to patch vulnerabilities instantly.

benefits: Real-time fraud detection at the meter
